issue.title: Schema comparison bugs in struct and union types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-732](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-732). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
struct and union fields comparison fails to detect different children fields in some of the cases
